channel.title: Orange Pi Lite2 on Orange Pi
channel.description: Recent content in Orange Pi Lite2 on Orange Pi

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started # Here you will learn more about your Orange Pi Lite 2. What stuff you need to get started and how to set up the board. Requirements # Orange Pi Lite 2 # 2. A power supply # You need a power supply that provides at least 5 volts, 2.0 amps for Orange Pi Lite 2. The power adapter comes in two variants EU and US plug.
